title: Rep. Krishnamoorthi on DHS Funding, Project Vault
description: Representative Raja Krishnamoorthi (D) Illinois discusses what reforms & changes Democrats want to see with ICE that will help Congress reach a compromise on DHS funding. He also voices his reaction to President Trump’s “Project Vault,” and its importance to compete with China. Rep. Krishnamoorthi speaks with Joe Mathieu and Julie Fine on the late edition of Bloomberg’s “Balance of Power.” (Source: Bloomberg)
